column4: hm, well, i'm just going to remove the evolution packages, since my problem seems related to evolution, and i use thunderbird anyway.
if i mark the ubuntu-desktop package for deletion in synaptic, will everything go to hell? or will i survive until it's time to update
it will be fine, at least until you try using the "autoremove" function of apt-get
no, if you install it again, evolution will get reinstalled too.
